descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s17.postimage.org/qcykve9zj/jja_sunglare.png[/img]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod replaces the sun glare texture with another less intrusive. It have less haze and just a streak that remind the "J.J.Abrams lens flares" in Star Trek movie and so you can get more sunny blue sky.

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12289-1-1331062682.jpg[/img]
[youtube]4Vepf3CNcwU[/youtube][/center]

* INSTALLATION *
Extract the rar and put the "textures" folder into the data folder of your Skyrim.

* UNINSTALLATION *
Be careful. Delete only the sunglare.dds in folders texturessky

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod replace any other mod that modify the sunglare too.

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find any bug or anomaly.

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12289-1-1331063394.jpg[/img][/center]
